title: SOULCALIBUR Ⅴ
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB SOULCALIBUR V, the latest chapter in the premier weapons-based fighting series, continues the epic story of the legendary soul swords 17 years after the events of SOULCALIBUR IV. SCV features a fluid 3D battle system, a new battle gauge that enables devastating attacks, increased freedom in character creation and a guest appearance by Ezio Auditore, the Master Assassin from "Assassin's Creed®".

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Active Wear 1
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This pack contains casual clothing that's ideal for exercise routines. Most of the pieces in this pack are for female characters. See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 1" to view details.)

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Active Wear 2
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) If "Active Wear 1" just wasn't your thing, maybe this will be more your style? It includes unisex clothes for male and female characters, and we've tossed in a bonus, too! See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 4" to view details.)

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Additional Character: Dampierre
childDownloads.description: That dandy gentleman has returned in HD quality! See him in action in the new chapter of "SOULCALIBUR."  Please note that this content should only be purchased if you did not receive "Dampierre" as a pre-order bonus.

childDownloads.title: Ancient Armor 1
childDownloads.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB This pack contains full plate armor in a High Gothic style. You can make all sorts of fun variations by combining it with the equipment available in the game. See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 2" to view details.)

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Ancient Armor 2
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This suit of armor is of a style worn by soldiers in ancient Rome. Combine it with equipment found in-game to create a variety of different styles. See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 8" to view details.)

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Beast Customization Equipment
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  Unleash your inner beast with this pack of customization equipment! This pack includes 4 pieces of animal-themed head equipment, 2 Japanese-style stickers, and 3 pieces of equipment.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Boy's Day Festival 1
childDownloads.description: This pack contains Boy's Day festival samurai armor costume. Boy's Day is a Japanese holiday that celebrates the happiness of children. See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 3" to view details.)

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Bridal Costumes 1
childDownloads.description: We've prepared a pack of bride and groom costumes for June! See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 6" to view details.)

childDownloads.title: Catalog 1
childDownloads.description: This is a list of customizable equipment. This list cannot be viewed from within the game.

childDownloads.title: Cepheus Compatibility Pack 1
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) You must have the Cepheus Compatibility Pack 1 to use the following in Creation: - Classic Headgears 1 - SCV Character Equipment 1 - Maid Costumes 1 - Active Wear 1

childDownloads.title: Cepheus Compatibility Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB You must have the Cepheus Compatibility Pack 2 to purchase the following in Creation:  - Ancient Armor 1 - Modern Costumes 1 - Tekken Costumes 1

childDownloads.title: Cepheus Compatibility Pack 3
childDownloads.description: You must have the Cepheus Compatibility Pack 3 to purchase the following in Creation:  - Miscellaneous Equipment 1 - Headgears 1 - Boy's Day Festival 1 - Modern Costumes 2

childDownloads.title: Cepheus Compatibility Pack 4
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) You must have the Cepheus Compatibility Pack 4 to purchase the following in Creation:  - Hairstyles 1 - Skeleton Costumes 1 - SCV Character Equipment 2 - Active Wear 2

childDownloads.title: Classic Costumes 1
childDownloads.description: This pack contains costumes for Talim and Seong Mi-na in SOULCALIBUR IV for female characters. See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 7" to view details.)

childDownloads.title: Classic Headgears 1
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) A set of headgear from past games in the series proved to be a popular download the last time around, so what the heck, we're offering it again! Note that some pieces can be worn only by male characters. See the in-game store for detailed information about this product. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 1" to view details.)

childDownloads.title: Dark Warrior Armor 1
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This pack is only for male characters and features armor for a dark warrior. (Download "Cepheus Compatibility Pack 8" to view details.)
